naming_rules.transmission: Use 'S tronic', 'Tiptronic', 'Manual' as appears in official specs
naming_rules.drivetrain: Use 'quattro' for AWD, omit for FWD
naming_rules.fuel_type: Include 'TDI' for diesel, 'TFSI' for petrol, 'e-tron' for electric
naming_rules.trim_levels: Common patterns: Progress, Ultra, S line, Edition, GT, Performance

usage_instructions.purpose: These examples show real-world Audi variant naming patterns from Danish market
usage_instructions.application: Use these as inspiration for consistent variant naming during AI extraction
usage_instructions.flexibility: Adapt patterns to match actual specifications found in PDFs
usage_instructions.consistency: Prioritize matching existing dealer listings over these examples
